definition: for a specific purpose/specially
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: When Esau was forty years old, he took as wife Judith.
sentences.chinese: 厄撒乌到四十岁时，娶了巴色玛特为妻。

sentences.english: To this end was I born, and for this cause came I into the world, that I should bear witness unto the truth.
sentences.chinese: 我为此而生，也为此来到世间，特为给真理作见证。

sentences.english: Nouakchott is the capital and the largest city.
sentences.chinese: 努尔克肖特为首都和最大城市。

sentences.english: The company will custom-build a kitchen cabinet to your specifications.
sentences.chinese: 公司将特为你定做一个厨房用食橱。

sentences.english: Thou wilt say then, The branches were broken off, that I might be graffed in.
sentences.chinese: 你若说，那枝子被折下来，是特为叫我接上。

sentences.english: Goods Brief:specially formulated for use by the ancient China's princess and concubines.
sentences.chinese: 此草本药盐乃古中国宫廷特为王妃所配制的秘方。

sentences.english: This is a special school for the deaf.
sentences.chinese: 这是一所特为聋人办的学校。

sentences.english: The retreat was customized for full time caregivers from various Christian social ministries.
sentences.chinese: 此退修会特为关怀机构的全时间同工而量身设计的。

definition: hereby
(literary) to offer food and drinks/to entertain
on this (occasion)/at this time when .../on this occasion
to come with a specific purpose in mind
wholeheartedly
for the benefit of the reader
to provide as expedient/to use temporarily as/to make shift
just at that time/as it happens/by good luck, just then
to present respectfully
to venture to/to presume to/to take the liberty of
to do one's utmost
to just happen to coincide with
to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
to tell respectfully/to announce reverentially
to find time to do sth in the midst of pressing affairs
on the happy occasion of
